## How to create EKS secret
```shell
kubectl create secret docker-registry ecr-secret-nestjs-demo \
  --namespace backend \
  --docker-server=114018177393.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com \
  --docker-username=AWS \
  --docker-
```

## How to get password above
```shell
aws ecr get-login-password --region us-east-2 
```

## How to get currently EKS cluster kubeconfig
```shell
- kubectl config current-context
- aws eks update-kubeconfig --name purocoach-eks-dev --kubeconfig /Users/andrew/Desktop/content/client/crmcoaching/crm-coach/code/app/nestjs_template_project/k8s_yaml/kubeconfig

```
